table.name: jc_chnl_group_contri
table.Comment: CMS栏目投稿会员组关联表

table.name: jc_chnl_group_view
table.Comment: CMS栏目浏览会员组关联表

table.name: jc_content_group_view
table.Comment: CMS内容浏览会员组关联表

table.name: jc_site_access_count
table.Comment: 每日统计页数访问情况

table.name: manager_model_page
table.Comment: 管理员对应的每个模块的主界面自定义

table.name: mdiy_content_mode_field
table.Comment: 自定义内容模型关联字段表

table.name: time_zone_leap_second
table.Comment: Leap seconds information for time zones

column.name: app_url
column.Comment: 站点域名，多个回车换行显示

column.name: ba_datetime
column.Comment: 用户收藏文章，帖子或商品时的时间

column.name: ba_url
column.Comment: 收藏的文章,帖子，商品的链接地址

column.name: column_type
column.Comment: 1,代表最终列表栏目。2，代表频道封面。3，带表外部链接

column.name: column_url
column.Comment: 如果是外部链接，则保持外部链接地址。如果为最终列表栏目，就保存文章显示列表

column.name: column_listurl
column.Comment: 最终列表栏目的列表模板地址

column.name: comment_picture
column.Comment: 评论时发布的图片，可上传多张图片

column.name: comment_type
column.Comment: 评论的类型：1 匿名，2 公开，默认为公开

column.name: comment_peopleid
column.Comment: 评论者id，默认为非会员用户（即游客）

column.name: source_uuid
column.Comment: uuid of the source where the transaction was originally executed.

column.name: apply_account
column.Comment: 申请账户（微信号或支付宝账户）

column.name: apply_status
column.Comment: 处理状态(0申请中 1申请成功待支付 2申请失败 3提现成功)

column.name: status
column.Comment: 当前状态(0:静止;1:采集;2:暂停)

column.name: is_admin
column.Comment: 是否默认管理后台API账户

column.name: limit_single_device
column.Comment: 是否限制单设备同时登陆

column.name: limit_call_day
column.Comment: 每日限制调用次数(0无限制)

column.name: sign
column.Comment: 签名数据(不允许重复调用)

column.name: after_check
column.Comment: 审核后(1:不能修改删除;2:修改后退回;3:修改后不变)

column.name: comment_control
column.Comment: 评论(0:匿名;1:会员一次;2:关闭,3会员多次)

column.name: def_img
column.Comment: 图片不存在时默认图片

column.name: validate_type
column.Comment: 验证类型：0:无 1：邮件验证 2：SMS验证

column.name: view_only_checked
column.Comment: 只有终审才能浏览内容页

column.name: channel_count_clear_time
column.Comment: 栏目发布内容计数器清除时间

column.name: day_count
column.Comment: 短信验证 每日验证次数限制

column.name: pay_transfer_password
column.Comment: 转账支付密码（管理后台验证）

column.name: category
column.Comment: 模型项目所属分类（1注册模型）

column.name: status
column.Comment: 状态(0:草稿;1:审核中;2:审核通过;3:回收站;4:投稿;5:归档)

column.name: has_paid_author
column.Comment: 是否已经结算给作者(0未结算 1已经结算)

column.name: operate_type
column.Comment: 0 新增 1修改 2审核 3退回 4移动 5生成静态页 6删除到回收站 7归档 8出档 9推送共享

column.name: msg_box
column.Comment: 消息信箱 0收件箱 1发件箱 2草稿箱 3垃圾箱

column.name: oss_type
column.Comment: 存储类型(1腾讯云cos 2阿里云oss 3七牛云)

column.name: is_used
column.Comment: 使用状态(0未使用,1使用中)

column.name: plug_perms
column.Comment: 插件权限（,分隔各个权限配置）

column.name: plug_repair
column.Comment: 是否修复类插件(0 新功能插件 1修复类)

column.name: msg_box
column.Comment: 消息信箱 0收件箱 1发件箱 2草稿箱 3垃圾箱

column.name: is_index_to_root
column.Comment: 是否使用将首页放在根目录下

column.name: after_check
column.Comment: 审核后(1:不能修改删除;2:修改后退回;3:修改后不变)

column.name: mobile_static_dir
column.Comment: 手机站静态页存放目录

column.name: mobile_static_sync
column.Comment: 手机站静态页同步生成

column.name: statisitc_type
column.Comment: 统计分类（all代表当天所有访问量的统计）

column.name: data_type
column.Comment: 0:编辑器;1:文本框;2:文本区;3:图片;4:附件

column.name: interval_time
column.Comment: 短信发送间隔时间 0无限制

column.name: effective_time
column.Comment: 短信验证码有效时间 0无限制

column.name: sms_up_extend_code
column.Comment: 上行短信扩展码,无特殊需要此字段的用户请忽略此字段(阿里)

column.name: invoke_id
column.Comment: 发送使用签名的调用ID(百度)

column.name: sms_source
column.Comment: SMS服务平台1阿里 2腾讯 3百度

column.name: validate_type
column.Comment: 验证类型 0：未知 1 : 注册验证 2 : 找回密码验证

column.name: task_type
column.Comment: 任务类型(1首页静态化、2栏目页静态化、3内容页静态化、4采集、5分发)

column.name: execycle
column.Comment: 执行周期分类(1非表达式 2 cron表达式)

column.name: source
column.Comment: 第三方账号平台(QQ、新浪微博等)

column.name: is_self_admin
column.Comment: 是否只管理自己的数据

column.name: statu
column.Comment: 状态 0审核通过 1禁用 2待审核

column.name: is_all_channel
column.Comment: 是否拥有所有栏目的权限

column.name: repeate_hour
column.Comment: 重复投票限制时间，单位小时，为空不允许重复投票

column.name: vote_day
column.Comment: 限定微信投票每个用户每日投票次数,为0时则投票期内限定投票一次

column.name: wm_msg_type
column.Comment: 消息类型(0带图文链接 1内容加关键字提示 2仅有内容)

column.name: mmp_url
column.Comment: 默认后台显示的主界面

column.name: field_type
column.Comment: 字段类型（如1.单行，2.多行，3.图片，等）

column.name: field_isnull
column.Comment: 字段是否为空 0:必填 1:可选

column.name: field_issearch
column.Comment: 字段是否支持后台搜索0：不支持，1：支持

column.name: form_app_id
column.Comment: 自定义表单关联的应用编号

column.name: ff_type
column.Comment: 字段类型（如1.单行，2.多行，3.图片，等）

column.name: page_path
column.Comment: 自定义页面绑定模板的路径

column.name: model_parent_ids
column.Comment: 父级编号集合，从小到大排序

column.name: OLDA
column.Comment: 现行标准 薪酬档级

column.name: OLDB
column.Comment: 现行标准 月工资额

column.name: OLDC
column.Comment: 现行标准 年薪总额

column.name: NEWA
column.Comment: 调整后标准 薪酬档级

column.name: NEWB
column.Comment: 调整后标准 月工资额

column.name: NEWC
column.Comment: 调整后标准 年薪总额

column.name: Number_of_lines
column.Comment: Number of lines in the file.

column.name: Master_log_name
column.Comment: The name of the master binary log currently being read from the master.

column.name: Master_log_pos
column.Comment: The master log position of the last read event.

column.name: Host
column.Comment: The host name of the master.

column.name: User_name
column.Comment: The user name used to connect to the master.

column.name: User_password
column.Comment: The password used to connect to the master.

column.name: Port
column.Comment: The network port used to connect to the master.

column.name: Connect_retry
column.Comment: The period (in seconds) that the slave will wait before trying to reconnect to the master.

column.name: Enabled_ssl
column.Comment: Indicates whether the server supports SSL connections.

column.name: Ssl_ca
column.Comment: The file used for the Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.

column.name: Ssl_capath
column.Comment: The path to the Certificate Authority (CA) certificates.

column.name: Ssl_cert
column.Comment: The name of the SSL certificate file.

column.name: Ssl_cipher
column.Comment: The name of the cipher in use for the SSL connection.

column.name: Ssl_key
column.Comment: The name of the SSL key file.

column.name: Ssl_verify_server_cert
column.Comment: Whether to verify the server certificate.

column.name: Bind
column.Comment: Displays which interface is employed when connecting to the MySQL server

column.name: Ignored_server_ids
column.Comment: The number of server IDs to be ignored, followed by the actual server IDs

column.name: Retry_count
column.Comment: Number of reconnect attempts, to the master, before giving up.

column.name: Ssl_crl
column.Comment: The file used for the Certificate Revocation List (CRL)

column.name: Ssl_crlpath
column.Comment: The path used for Certificate Revocation List (CRL) files

column.name: Enabled_auto_position
column.Comment: Indicates whether GTIDs will be used to retrieve events from the master.

column.name: Channel_name
column.Comment: The channel on which the slave is connected to a source. Used in Multisource Replication

column.name: Number_of_lines
column.Comment: Number of lines in the file or rows in the table. Used to version table definitions.

column.name: Relay_log_name
column.Comment: The name of the current relay log file.

column.name: Relay_log_pos
column.Comment: The relay log position of the last executed event.

column.name: Master_log_name
column.Comment: The name of the master binary log file from which the events in the relay log file were read.

column.name: Master_log_pos
column.Comment: The master log position of the last executed event.

column.name: Sql_delay
column.Comment: The number of seconds that the slave must lag behind the master.

column.name: Id
column.Comment: Internal Id that uniquely identifies this record.

column.name: Channel_name
column.Comment: The channel on which the slave is connected to a source. Used in Multisource Replication

column.name: Channel_name
column.Comment: The channel on which the slave is connected to a source. Used in Multisource Replication

column.name: perms
column.Comment: 授权(多个用逗号分隔，如：user:list,user:create)

column.name: bean_class
column.Comment: 任务执行时调用哪个类的方法 包名+类名

column.name: ss_app_id
column.Comment: 0后台发布大于０表示是应用自定义
